thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 2 of 701
thread.title: OWEN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by OWEN

author: OWEN
title: OWEN
text:
Was surprised by how rude and begrudging the Redspot employee was. Seemed like we'd ruined his day by turning up to collect the hire car that had been booked several days earlier.
Was very aggressive on insurance and additional payments. Hostile tone for no apparent reason.
Left the office after giving us a key so that we couldn't point out the car was scratched in multiple places before we collected it. (Wanted to point this out to demonstrate the condition of the car before we drove it)
In a service based industry, there should really be someone who isn't so rude and hostile towards consumers.
